5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Anas bin Malik that the people used to speak to the Prophet (ﷺ) about their needs when he came down from the pulpit on Friday

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْكَلاَمِ بَعْدَ نُزُولِ الإِمَامِ عَنِ الْمِنْبَرِ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning speaking after the Imam comes down from the pulpit
